idea-plugin.name: Actionable
idea-plugin.description:
Adds some favorite/extra actions that are not available in IntelliJ based IDEs.

Features:
  • Duplicate line(s) up - (VSCode like)
  • Duplicate line(s) down - (VSCode like)
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 1.0.0: Fixed some issues with plugin.xml
  • 1.0.0-Beta: Initial Release

action.description: Duplicate selected line(s) above the current selection; or just the line, which caret is located at, if no selection exists
Duplicate selected line(s) below the current selection; or just the line, which caret is located at, if no selection exists
